summary: Build a dreamy, romantic Rose Day website dedicated to Ashvena featuring a rose-filled background, falling roses animation, interactive clickable roses with rotating love messages, romantic typography/animations, optional background music, and extra romantic visual elements (hearts/sparkles) for sharing as a link.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Realistic rose garden background with many red/pink/white roses, soft dreamy lighting (rose-garden-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Single realistic red rose cutout on transparent background (rose-red-icon.dim_256x256.png)
- Single realistic pink rose cutout on transparent background (rose-pink-icon.dim_256x256.png)
- Single realistic white rose cutout on transparent background (rose-white-icon.dim_256x256.png)
- Soft sparkle / bokeh light particle on transparent background (sparkle-particle.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Replace the current Valentine proposal experience with a single-page Rose Day website dedicated to Ashvena, with the main heading exactly: "üåπ Happy Rose Day, My Love Ashvena üåπ" and an overall dreamy, soft, romantic feel.

Create a rose-filled background that visually reads as "hundreds of realistic red, pink, and white roses" with a soft pastel glow overlay, and add an animated layer of roses/petals gently falling from the top of the screen across the entire page.

Add an "Interactive Roses" section containing multiple clickable roses; clicking a rose reveals a short sweet message, with different messages across roses and repeated clicks cycling through the available messages for that rose (or showing another message deterministically per-rose). Include at least these messages verbatim as options: ‚ÄúI love you Jnu ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äù, ‚ÄúYou are my favorite rose üåπ‚Äù, ‚ÄúForever yours, Ashvena‚Äù, ‚ÄúMy heart blooms for you‚Äù, ‚ÄúEvery rose reminds me of you‚Äù, ‚ÄúYou are my always‚Äù, ‚ÄúOne rose, endless love‚Äù.
Add a "Special Love" highlighted message area that displays the following text exactly: "Ashvena, just like roses, my love for you grows more beautiful every day. Happy Rose Day, my Jnu ‚ù§Ô∏è"

Add extra romantic visual elements across the page: floating hearts, sparkles, soft glow on hover over roses, and a final closing section that displays exactly: "This garden of roses is only for you, Ashvena üåπ"
Use elegant cursive typography for love messages/headings (while maintaining readability) and update the document title in the HTML head to reflect the Rose Day dedication to Ashvena.
Provide optional calm romantic background music with a user-controlled play/pause toggle (do not autoplay on load).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Rose Day website dedicated to Ashvena with dreamy/soft romantic theme and main heading text
Rose-filled background (hundreds of realistic red/pink/white roses) with pastel glow aesthetic and smooth romantic animations
Falling roses/petals animation from top of screen
Interactive roses section: clickable roses showing a different sweet message per click/rose
Special love area: highlighted message box with provided long dedication text
Extra romantic elements: floating hearts, sparkles, and hover glow on roses
Final section with closing line: 'This garden of roses is only for you, Ashvena üåπ'

projectName: Dreamy Rose Day website dedicated to Ashvena (rose-filled background, falling roses, clickable love messages)
